ComicInfo.Inker: Emir Ribeiro,Mike Deodato Jr.,Mike Deodato Jr.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T17:44:41 [Issue ID 4000-117679] urn:comicvine:4000-117679 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev43 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-18 20:37:16. [Issue ID 117679]
ComicInfo.Summary: Japan's sexiest, steamiest killing squad is on the move! As Angel (Deathkiss) Sorayama seeks sanctuary in the home of smitten, unwitting writer Bob Campbell, her former clanmate Jade Warriors track her down -- to fulfill their deadly mission. But the Yakuza's carefully crafted female assassination cult has a surprise up its collective sleeve by the name of RAMTHAR -- seven hundred pounds of malevolent male man-monster with murder on his mind! PLUS: This issue also features the rare, out-of-print "Deathkiss" preview scene originally published in Asylum #2. Those pages have been revamped and "remastered" -- rewritten, redrawn, relettered and/or recolored! "To Die For" features Mike Deodato's bodacious babe assassins in an action-drenched, power-packed adventure you'll never forget. Note: this issue ships in 50/50 quantities with a special alternate photo cover starring "exotica" cover model Lisa (Sweet Asia) Wills!
ComicInfo.Title: To Die For
